description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play Trap Ball challenge and test your skills. In Trap Ball you will go through stages filled with traps: You must escape from lasers, spikes, other balls chasing you, and many more things while you try to make it to the goal. Accept the challenge and test your skills!  Every once in a while new and free stages will be added.  Languages available: Spanish and English.
